species.name: Gigorans
species.description: Well over 2 meters of sinew and fur each, Gigorans are often mistaken for Wookiees or wampas. Their long, flowing hair is typically a pale shade of white, cream, gold, or even blue. Their long torso and arms are at odds with their relatively short, stumpy legs. Nevertheless, their limbs are thick and powerful, ending in massive paws. The hair atop their head often grows long, sometimes obscuring their dark eyes, and it tends to come in blackish streaks.
species.specialAbilities: Remove 1 Setback imposed due to cold or snow-filled conditions. Upgrade difficulty of Mechanics checks involving advanced technology once.
